pages.text: The Elf race is proficient in ranged combat, being capable of charging bow shots to make them deal more damage. They also have affinity with the forest, gaining a speed bonus while in one. Due to having no downsides, it is recommended to pick this race if you want to experience a unique race without any negative consequences for incorrectly using it.

$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)100% Size$(br)$(2)+30%$() Attack Speed$(br)$(2)+10%$() Movement Speed$(br)$(4)-25%$() Attack Damage$(br)$(l)In Forest:$()$(br)$(2)+50%$() Attack Speed$(br)$(2)+20%$() Movement Speed$(br)$(2)+20%$() Jump Height$(br)

$(l)Ability: Charged Bow Shot$()$(br)Sneaking while drawing a bow begins to charge a power shot at the cost of mana. Releasing an arrow at any point during this increases the damage, and fully charging a shot causes it to explode on impact (this will not break blocks).
